Awesome!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Zack Widup 
  To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 13, 2009 8:44 AM
  Subject: Re: [E=
VP-ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV FILES






  Another on=
e is http://www.box.com. You get a pretty good amount of storage space with=
 the free account.

  Zack


  On Wed, May 13, 2009 at 9:07 AM, April Aberc=
rombie <april@...> wrote:





    This type of fi=
le sharing is new to me. I have a photo album site for sharing and uploadin=
g photos, but you can't upload files. I didn't know there were file sharing=
 sites until joined this group, but I had always thought there should be.

=
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Misty 
      To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, May 13, 2009 12:58 AM
      Subject: =
[EVP-ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV FILES


      LOL Snow=
fire! Nope it was not you this time. Others should read before they post be=
cause we just addressed this subject. Esnips is very easy to use it has two=
 uploading options in case you cant use the java application use the single=
 file uploader. Works alot like email upload attachments.

      If you nee=
d more help just holler and I am sure one of us will be more than willing t=
o help you figure it out. Posting from email as an attachment also works ju=
st not so well for the very large file sizes. There are many other file sha=
ring storage places besides esnips. We just like the layout there and the a=
bility to share with friends including sharing storage space.

      Misty
=

      --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
      >
      >=
 Well, it is not me, I took out the folder, and I removed the files, I can'=
t 
      > figure out esnips, it says it will take lots of files at once bu=
t, it 
      > never sends a connection, to upload anything.
      > 
     =
 > 
      > In a message dated 5/13/2009 2:45:10 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time=
, 
      > bulletbabea@... writes:
      > 
      > 
      > 
      > 
    =
  > 
      > Ok I am getting tired of having to say this especially twice i=
n a couple 
      > days. Do not upload wav format files if you feel you mu=
st share it in wav 
      > format then use esnips or another file sharing =
source. If newbies cant follow 
      > the groups rules then you will not =
be allowed to upload files period. 
      > 
      > Everything will be del=
eted and you may reupload in proper formats and 
      > remember to respec=
t the fact that this group of over 500 people has a limited 
      > amoyun=
t of file sharing space on yahoo. Only 100 megs split between 
      > ever=
yone. that is why we work to get around our limitations by attaching files =
to 
      > posts via email attachment or using _http://www.esnips.htt_ 
  =
    > (http://www.esnips.com/) etcetera.
      > 
      > Misty
      >
